function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of historical precedent for the current pathogen and policies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 rna detected in untreated wastewater samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Travel-related risks for vulnerable communities due to lack of job opportunities near neighborhoods and insufficient support for active transportation.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of poor neighborhood hygiene","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on mental health","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in recreational use on remote trails due to social distancing advisories","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of covid-19 transmission in construction sites due to close proximity of workers and shared workspaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overproduction of residential buildings due to market policy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate separation of heat and contaminants in displacement ventilation systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discharge of chemical wastes into the drainage system","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of digital tools by public management may have challenges in implementation and adaptation of activities, particularly in the context of isolation measures.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncomfortable temperature and humidity conditions leading to energy wastage and decreased comfort","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequacy of universal masking in reducing workplace transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission risk due to traditional hvac systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagion-related behaviours like breathing, sneezing, and coughing can lead to the spread of air-based contagions in the built environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Approximately 60% of human pathogens are estimated to be of zoonotic origin","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate approach to managing the risk of vector-borne diseases like malaria","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to the buildup of airborne contaminants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation and indoor environmental quality","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Estimates imply that the populations in europe are not close to herd immunity.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Surveillance and monitoring by corporations and governance entities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ozone production as a by-product of uv-c radiation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systematic under-reporting of deaths leading to inaccurate seroprevalence estimates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High hedonic well-being and low eudaimonic well-being","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher average scores for software and hardware in group a compared to group b may indicate unequal access to technology for remote work.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived difficulties in interpreting quarantine protocols and lack of clear rationale/guidelines.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conflicting data on benzalkonium chloride efficacy against coronavirus at different concentrations and contact times.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparison of covid-19 precautionary measures from a global perspective.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High firm density in office spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the return of passenger air demand to pre-pandemic levels","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pronounced social gradient in the mental health consequences of lockdowns.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Behavioral changes due to the covid-19 crisis affecting entrepreneurship","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Talent turnover costs the business in both money and time.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air quality standards and monitoring","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Subjects with weak immune systems at risk of symptomatic infection, including those undergoing immunosuppressive therapy and those with excessive workload or irregular sleep patterns.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on construction sector leading to a drop in fixed asset investment and real estate development.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slow movement of the internet of things towards humanization","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited utilization of evidence in decision-making in low and middle-income countries.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation leading to loss of productivity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virtual strategies in the area of health and support to the hospital system","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different building codes and systems of sustainability assessments in different countries may lead to inconsistencies and lack of standardization in pandemic-sustainable criteria for residential buildings.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential dissemination of inaccurate or misleading information about covid-19 due to the use of semi-autonomous systems and telehealth care.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Eu3: energy use","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extensive use of paper signs for conveying covid-19 information","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of pandemics on trade and offshoring of the production process","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Globalization of cycles diminishing resilience","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on hotel industry in urban areas","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased traffic congestion","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concealed information, ambiguity in risk perception","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Policy measures to support startups","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"}]}
